about_the_game:
'Keysight' is an Unreal Engine powered real-time midi visualization platform aimed at piano/keyboard-focused streamers and video creators. Its purpose is to provide an all-in-one solution to creating exciting, performance-enhancing visuals.

This program is intended to integrate with an external midi controller (such as a digital piano or keyboard). The demo has a watermark and is locked to ignore 50% of note-on midi events, but otherwise contains full program functionality.

Keysight features hundreds of unique options to customize the look of your content down to the finest detail. Modular particle systems with path behavior control, velocity-driven color blending modes, user-imported custom textures for PBR material set-ups. Sounds intimidating? New color schemes can be generated with an extensive, configurable randomizer instead!

Features

- Top-down or bottom-up note indicator modes
- Full 3D camera
- Physically-based materials with user-imported texture support
- Modular particle systems with up to 5 configurable slots
- 6 color blending modes
- Linked or independent colors per dynamic object
- Basic or Advanced menu modes
- Randomizer with 112 configurable chance branches to generate new color schemes
- Comprehensive statistics for note presses
- ... and much more!
detailed_description:
'Keysight' is an Unreal Engine powered real-time midi visualization platform aimed at piano/keyboard-focused streamers and video creators. Its purpose is to provide an all-in-one solution to creating exciting, performance-enhancing visuals.

This program is intended to integrate with an external midi controller (such as a digital piano or keyboard). The demo has a watermark and is locked to ignore 50% of note-on midi events, but otherwise contains full program functionality.

Keysight features hundreds of unique options to customize the look of your content down to the finest detail. Modular particle systems with path behavior control, velocity-driven color blending modes, user-imported custom textures for PBR material set-ups. Sounds intimidating? New color schemes can be generated with an extensive, configurable randomizer instead!

Features

- Top-down or bottom-up note indicator modes
- Full 3D camera
- Physically-based materials with user-imported texture support
- Modular particle systems with up to 5 configurable slots
- 6 color blending modes
- Linked or independent colors per dynamic object
- Basic or Advanced menu modes
- Randomizer with 112 configurable chance branches to generate new color schemes
- Comprehensive statistics for note presses
- ... and much more!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 1.15.x
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel Core i5 (Macbook Air 2019 or newer)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel graphics (some lighting features may not render correctly)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Midi controller is required for full functionality
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 1.15.x
  • Processor: Hex-core Intel Core i7 (Macbook Pro 2018 or newer)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (Macbook Pro 16" or eGPU)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Midi controller is required for full functionality

name: Keysight Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500k (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Midi controller is required for full functionality
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600k (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Midi controller is required for full functionality

short_description: Keysight is a real-time configurable midi visualization platform powered by Unreal Engine, built for piano-focused streamers and content creators. Beautiful, performance-accompanying visualizations have never been simpler!
